Guide.title: Sigma Fire Lite ?
Guide.Content: For the record, STUDIO ARM PRIVATE LIMITED, SINGAPORE is a gaming developer and publisher that recently launched Sigma Battle Royale Game on the play store for your information. For the sake of clarity, this publisher or developer has absolutely nothing to do with 111 Dot Studio or Garena, who are considering this game to be Free Fire-Lite when it is actually a fraud.If Garena had to sell the lite version of Free Fire, you can see why it would have done it under a different brand for other publishers. Garena will indeed publish the Lite version of Free Fire, but when? The general public has not been provided with this information.Please note that if you come across the Sigma Free Fire Lite APK file in any way, you should not download or install it since it may disclose your privacy. If you want to download and test this game, you’ll need to install it on a mobile device that doesn’t have access to your personal information. If you download this game, it is strongly recommended that you play as a guest..
